title.narrative: Mr KANG, Zhou, Associate Professional Officer, Food Safety and Quality Officer

description.narrative:
The Food Safety and Quality Unit of the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Department supports the strengthening of systems of food safety and quality management at national, regional and international levels. This involves providing scientific advice on food safety issues, support to programmes of capacity development and facilitation of effective communication and access to information by all Member countries on food safety and quality issues.
The objectives of the project are to: Support the programme of scientific advice on microbiological risk, in particular, the project will enable the completion of work on water quality as it impacts on food safety along the food chain, and on developing expert advice on Shiga Toxin producing E. coli (STEC).
Support the programme of work on AMR, in particular, scientific advice to enable progress in the work of the Codex Task Force on AMR, technical advice and guidance to the country work related to strengthening microbiological analytical capacity and surveillance, and support to the coordination of the FAO collaborating centres on AMR.
Support food safety capacity development programmes, including the development of reviews on analyses on selected food safety issues.
